meanings.definition: Enrolling: to officially register or sign up for a course or program.
meanings.sent1: She is enrolling in the art class next week.
meanings.sent2: Students are enrolling for the new semester.
meanings.sent3: After enrolling in the cooking class, she realized she couldn't even boil water!
meanings.sent4: His passion for learning was like enrolling in a never-ending adventure.
meanings.sent5: Enrolling in the dance workshop made her heart dance with joy.

meanings.definition: Enrolling: to become a member of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: He is enrolling in the chess club at school.
meanings.sent2: New employees are enrolling in the company's training program.
meanings.sent3: After enrolling in the book club, she found herself surrounded by bookworms.
meanings.sent4: Joining the team felt like enrolling in a supportive family.
meanings.sent5: Enrolling in the environmental club made him feel like a guardian of nature.
